resources.string:
Location where you specified, "kitakutter" will Tweet. Twitter Bot client.


1.Overview
 When you will go the location where you specified, "kitakutter" will Tweet. Twitter Bot client.


2.Operations
 Enabling location and network.

 Navigation Drawer
 [2.1. Get GEOCOD]
 You enter the location in Text box.

 [2.2. Get Timeline]
 You get Timeline of Twitter.

 [2.3. Tweet]
 Decomposed a Timeline into words, and "kitakutter" generate new phrase.(Generate phrase botton) Set Tweet.(Tweet botton)

 When you will go the GeoCode location where you specified, "kitakutter" tweet generated phrase.(Auto)
